channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
Small businesses face affordability crunch as tariff and other costs rise
item.description: Some small business owners say they're struggling to stay afloat because of higher tariff, health insurance and energy costs.

item.title: WATCH: A look back at the year 2025
item.description: From news stories to heartfelt moments and laughs, "Good Morning America" takes a look back at the year that was.

item.title: US jobless claim applications fell by 13,000 last week as layoffs remain low
item.description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits fell by 13,000 last week, remaining in the same historically healthy range of the past few years even as c...

item.title: Brian Walshe sentenced to life in prison for "barbaric" murder
item.description: Brian Walshe was sentenced to life in prison for the murder of Ana Walshe after her sister gave a victim impact statement in court.

item.title: Brian Walshe sentenced to life in prison for murdering and dismembering wife
item.description: A Norfolk County jury found Brian Walshe guilty of first-degree murder on Monday, after deliberating for approximately six hours.

item.title: WATCH: World's 1st gene-edited baby takes 1st steps
item.description: KJ Muldoon received the first-of-its-kind gene therapy for a potentially fatal disease and is now marking major developmental milestones.

item.title: CPI report shows the inflation rate rose at a 2.7% pace in November
item.description: Economists had expected CPI to rise at an annual rate of 3% last month.

item.title: Timothy Dolan | 60 Minutes Archive

item.title: Teen inmate captured weeks after escaping prison with bedsheets
item.description: The inmate and another detainee fled an overcrowded jail after sawing through their cell bars with blades that investigators suspect were delivered by...

item.title: Inflation drops to lowest level in months, defying expectations of uptick
item.description: Prices climbed 2.7% in November compared to a year earlier.

item.title: Pulitzer Prize-winning correspondent Peter Arnett, who reported on Vietnam and Gulf wars, has died
